title.rendered: Air Caledonie Airlines in Noumea, New Caledonia

content.rendered:
Societe Caledonienne de Transports Aeriens, operating as Air Caledonie, is a French airline and is the domestic airline for New Caledonia, headquartered on the grounds of Magenta Airport in Noumea. It was established on 1954.

 

Air Caledonie Address : Noumea, New Caledonia

Phone number : 25 21 77

Fax: 28 13 40

Opening hours: Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 5.30pm non-stop.
Saturday: 7.30am to 11am.
Closed on Bank holidays

Email: vente@air-caledonie.nc

Customer relations

Email: service-clientele@air-caledonie.nc

Cargo

Phone number : 25 03 33 – 25 03 34
Fax: 25 64 20
Email: fret-magenta@air-caledonie.nc

Opening hours: Monday to Friday: 7.00 am to 5.30 pm non-stop service
Saturday: 8 am to 1 pm
closed on Sunday and bank holidays

Agencies opening times

Agencies Address Opening times
Pacific Plaza 6 rue Unger,
1ère vallée du Tir – Nouméa		 Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 4.00pm (non-stop)
closed Saturdays and Holidays
Vao Isle of Pines Monday to Friday: 7:30am to 11:30am
closedSaturdays and Holidays
Wé Lifou Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 4.00pm (non-stop)
closed Saturdays and Holidays
Sales points Address Opening times
Isle of Pines Moué terminal Open according to flight times
Koné Koné terminal Open according to flight times
Lifou Wanaham terminal Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 11.00am
The afternoons, saturdays and holidays
open according to flight times
Maré La Roche terminal Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 11.00 am
The afternoons, saturdays and holidays
open according to flight times
Ouvéa Ouloup terminal Monday to Friday: 7.30am to 11.00 am
The afternoons, saturdays and holidays
open according to flight times

Air Caledonie Official website : https://www.air-caledonie.nc/en/

Fleet size: 04

Current fleet

  • ATR 72-600

Former fleet

  • 5 ATR 42-300 (1986-2008)
  • 1 ATR 42-500 (2006-2016)
  • 3 ATR 72-500 (2006-2017)

Air Caledonie Baggage Allowance

Air Caledonie Baggage

View Air Caledonie Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Air Caledonie Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Caledonie in Noumea, New Caledonia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
